name: Goober’s Lab
description:
Webkinz World's™ most loved game is now available for the iPhone and iPod Touch!

Classic Match 3 gameplay! Switch the atoms to make rows of 3 or more to fill Goober's beaker before the time runs out. Watch for unstable atoms - use them in a line for bonus points!

Earn Kinzcash™ while you play! Store and send KinzCash earnings to your active Webkinz World account whenever you have an internet connection. Now you can earn KinzCash while you're on a vacation, in the car, or just hanging out in the backyard.

™, © 2010 GANZ. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED
